data.title: Platinum Equity
data.meta_description: Founded in 1995, Platinum Equity is a global investment firm with approximately $36 billion of assets under management, teams and investors around the world, and a diverse, global portfolio of operating companies in a wide range of industries. Our current portfolio of ~50 companies operates in a diverse range of industries, generates $89+ billion of aggregate revenue and employs ~200,000 people across the globe.
data.text:
Description

Founded in 1995, Platinum Equity is a global investment firm with approximately $36 billion of assets under management, teams and investors around the world, and a diverse, global portfolio of operating companies in a wide range of industries. Our current portfolio of ~50 companies operates in a diverse range of industries, generates $89+ billion of aggregate revenue and employs ~200,000 people across the globe.
